Desc.eng: No. And I mean you no harm.
No...! No, you lie and seek to destroy me! But I'll give MYSELF a name and destroy YOU! Yes, that's it! I AM THE DESTROYER!!
No, but Katarina knows it. Don't you?
What...? I mean... yes I have your name and I decided to give it back! You are... Hearthfire! A creature of warmth.
That name... feels right.Yes.. it IS my name! THANK YOU!
No...! No, you lie and seek to destroy me! But I'll give MYSELF a name and destroy YOU! Yes, that's it! I AM THE DESTROYER!!!
Evil Spirit...? Could that be me...?
That name... feels right.Yes.. it IS my name! THANK YOU!
NO! That's... someone else who looks just like you ! You're a POWERFUL but BENEVOLENT being and we've met you before. Haven't we?
Erm... Yes. Your name is " Hearthfire".
